multi languages?

Doesn't work. Triggers "Parental controls restrict this game from running on this system."
I'm on the Administor Account which doesn't have Parental Controls, my Parental Controls service isn't even running, and I'm not the only one who's experienced this...

Alright, so here's a work-a-round...
Right-click on the "DisneyUPC.exe" file
Select "Properties"
Select the "Compatability" tab
Check the box for "Run this program in compatability mode for:" and select "Windows XP (Service Pack 2)" in the drop-down
Click "OK" and you should be good-to-go

Maybe a dumb question but I've never run into this on extremezones stuff before...

When I try and copy the rld.dll from the crack folder it says I need permission from Everyone to make changes to this file.

I'm logged on as administrator, using Win7 32.  Any suggestions?

@Squishygiblets 

I would strongly recommend you to give Everyone permissions to make changes to that file, in the security tab, under folder properties.
